question: A research institute for the study of the 'Bhagavad Gita' will be set up in __________.
explanation: A research institute for the study of the 'Bhagavad Gita' will be soon set up by the Uttar Pradesh government in Mathura. The Gita Research Institute has been proposed by the Yogi Adityanath government. The Assembly also passed the Lok Ayukta bill. It also passed a resolution on Nagaland political issue.
